pullRequest.body:
Also prove that a set is von Neumann bounded
iff `Filter.absorbing ùïú S ‚â§ ùìù 0`.

These lemmas make it easy to simplify ` IsVonNBounded ùïú S`,
provided that we have `ùìù 0 = ‚®Ö (a1 a2 ... ak), ùìü (f a1 a2 ... ak)`,
even if the family of sets in the RHS is not directed,
so `Filter.HasBasis` is false.

---

/-- The filter of sets that absorb `u`. -/

since `s` isn't actually one of the arguments.
Is this worth a mention in the module docstring and/or the docstring for `Absorbs`?
